title: Unable to join games for some reason, now i have a leave buster on my account, help???
body: Basically, this morning when i woke up i thought i'd play some ranked, i got into a game, as the game loaded, the usual stuff happened, but before it got to the load screen, it closed down and just the reconnect screen was there, i tried to reconnect and it wouldn't let me, i tried everything i could think of to fix the issue, i tried in a bot game as well the same thing happened, i now have a leaver buster on my account as well and i still can play the game, can someone help me please???

replies.body:
We have seem some reports of this exact issue when trying to get into Loading Screen.  Something we found during our investigation involves LoLReplay interacting very oddly with League of Legends with this patch, causing these crashes.  If you are using LoLReplay, make sure to temporarily uninstall it completely to see if this resolves your issue.

Let me know if your issues still persist!

Hey Dartagnan,

I'm encountering the exact same issue yet I've never had LoLReplay, any fix for this? I've been scrolling through forums and noticed many players with the same issue without it being addressed. Thanks in advance!

Peace.

Hey DaRTAGNAN,

I'm having the same issue. I had "Replay.gg" linked to my account, I unsubscribed but the problem persists. Do you have any clue of what else i could do? Haven't been able to play on my computer for 3 days... :(
